text: @SpeakerPelosi Mdm Speaker, so many of us are looking for a rational, proper response to the COVID-19 pandemic.  Please, is it possible for some kind of intervention to mount a national response for PPE, return to school, emergency procedure, etc?Americans are dying by the hundreds.
